example.text: Five years ago, Kevin McCarthy and House Republicans passed Donald Trump's tax scam with massive giveaways for billion-dollar corporations. Now, they want to cut veterans' health care, food assistance for women and children, and education funding to pay for it.
This bipartisan legislation will ensure that same-sex marriages are recognized and safeguarded. It's long overdue, and I couldn't be prouder to send it to the President's desk to be signed into law.

So while I am celebrating this legislation making its way to President Biden's desk, I plan to keep fighting for full equality for LGBTQ+ Americans under the law. Sincerely, Lori Trahan Member of Congress WASHINGTON, DC OFFICE 2439 Rayburn HOB Washington, DC 20515 Phone: (202) 225-3411 LOWELL OFFICE 126 John Street Lowell, MA 01852 Phone: (978) 459-0101 | Share on Facebook | Share on Twitter Click Here to view this email in your browser Click Here to be removed from this list

1 Year of the PACT Act Promises Kept ? Friend, When the difficult decision is made to send courageous servicemembers into harm's way, we make a promise to them and their families that we will do everything we can to ensure their safety, health, and well-being during their time abroad and upon their return home.

So while I am celebrating this legislation making its way to President Biden's desk, I plan to keep fighting for full equality for LGBTQ+ Americans under the law.
